## Zooming

---------------------------

### Without Clipping：
```{r}
t + coord_cartesian(xlim = c(0, 100), ylim = c(0, 100))
```

### With Clipping：
```{r}
t + xlim(0, 100) + ylim(10, 20)
```

```{r}
t + scale_x_continuous(limits = c(0, 100)) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(10, 20))
```
